title: FIX UR GAME
body:
i barely logged into my account and after that i had like 50 match declines
after some point i couldnt join queue my self
i restarted again and again and at some point i bugged and then i couldnt exit the queue

replies.body: It absolutely sucks that this is still happening.  :(  There's an[ emergency platform post ](https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements-en/tbyHzasZ-eune-emergency-platform-restart)now on the EUNE boards with updates as our network continues to resolve this.  Hang tight, we're on the case!
